snoopy.blindnote: gene name:AL445235.30->SNORD103A. Two perfect copies reside in the same host gene (PUM1). sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA G601 : SNORD103A SNORD85 SNORD103B (20100630末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Vitali, P., Royo, H., Seitz, H., Bachellerie, J. P., Huttenhofer, A., and Cavaille, J. (2003). Identification of 13 novel human modification guide RNAs. Nucleic Acids Res 31, 6543-6551.
